title: Agribusiness Credit and Finance
description: Financing California's agricultural industry. Sources of credit and types of loans used by agribusinesses. Costs of credit. Financial analysis of agricultural borrowers. Future and present value techniques used in evaluating agricultural investments. Agricultural financial management. Financial capital markets and leasing. 4 lectures.
prerequisites: AGB 214 for AGB majors; AGB 214 or BUS 212 or BUS 214 for non-AGB majors
